affirmation:
Wonderful things are going to happen to me.
Anything is possible

Today I am going to shine.
My possibilities are endless.

My imperfections make me human.
I forgive myself when I make a mistake.

I attract the perfect people at the right time.
I trust that what is right for me won't pass me by.

My ability to navigate challenges is limitless.
My potential to succeed is infinite.

My thoughts are filled with positivity.
My life is plentiful with prosperity.

I acknowledge my own self-worth.
My confidence is soaring.
I have strength in my heart and clarity in my mind.

I have the power to create change.
I am unstoppable.

I have everything I need.
I let go of all that no longer serves me.

I deserve the best.
I deserve love, compassion and kindness.

I listen to my intuition and trust my inner guide.
I trust myself to make the right decision.

I give myself space to grow and learn.
If I fall, I will get back up again.

I allow myself to be who I am without judgment.
I am enough. I am whole.
I accept my emotions and let them serve their purpose.
I give myself the care and attention that I deserve.

I am always headed in the right direction.
I trust that I am on the right path.
I make a difference in the world by simply existing in it.

I choose to focus on what I can change.
I stand up for what I believe in.

I can choose excitement over nervousness.
Change is good.
I have all the internal resources I need to thrive.
I am filled with love and acceptance for myself and others.

I choose to find the joy in my life.
I move forward with an open mind and heart.
I believe I am an incredible person. Inside and out.

I am becoming more confident.
I can choose to feel differently at any given moment.
I focus on each day, one hour at a time, one thing at a time.
Everyone’s path is uniquely beautiful, including my own.

I am capable of so much.
I am proud of myself.
My confidence grows when I step outside of my comfort zone.

It is enough to do my best.
It’s okay to make mistakes.

No matter how hard it is, I can do it.
I have inner strength.

My ability to navigate challenges is limitless.
My potential to succeed is infinite.

My thoughts are filled with positivity.
